description:
Hibiki is curious about why Shin isn`t coming after him, following his defeat of Yoh. Shiori, also wondering why they haven`t seen Shin for a while, asks Akane and Hoku about it. Meanwhile, mystery man Hyo arrives at the school on the order of Shin`s older brother, beats up Shian, and declares that he`ll be supervising the students in his place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce secret que je veux cacher
